column4: Eyewear-free for immediate, immersive, and interactive 3D experiences；nubia Pad 3D is a user-friendly device, with no extra setup or learning curves. Advanced 3D lightfield is enabled by a proprietary DLB layer that’s integrated beneath the LCD display, enabling 3D viewing. With the best consumer integrated stereoscopic 3D camera, create your own 3D content. Or use the real-time 2D to 3D content conversion application. Users can seamlessly switch between 3D and pristine 2D for an unmatched visual experience.；AI face tracking and 8 views vision；Real-time AI-based 2D to 3D content conversion；The largest 3D content ecosystem available；AI-powered 3D content maker；12.4 inches 2.5K large screen；Exquisite and portable；Quad stereo speakers；Strong performance；Ultra long duration；Multiple interfaces；Elegant vegan leather case
